manpage.title: ceil

description.para: The ceil function returns the smallest integer value greater than or equal to x, expressed as a floating-point number.

return.para: The ceil function returns a double value representing the smallest integer that is greater than or equal to x. There is no error return.

manpage.result: The ceil of 2.8 is 3.000000 The ceil of -2.8 is -2.000000
